rows.label: tlk00230104_msg0001
rows.name:
Ion has calmed down a little.
She's even started to smile
again. ...She is a strong girl.

rows.label: tlk00230104_msg0002
rows.name:
I've also started preparations to
chronicle Vandham's story, but
it's not progressing very well.

rows.label: tlk00230104_msg0003
rows.name:
I've been gathering stories from
his companions, but we always
get sidetracked reminiscing.

rows.label: tlk00230104_msg0004
rows.name:
It just goes to show how
much of a mark Vandham left
on everyone's hearts.
